info.title: TCC Documentation
info.description: This is an API that aims to provide a way to automatize the order requests at a restaurant as well as proving a forecasting feature that allows the user to forecast future demand for some ingredients.

put.description: Update fields in a Restaurant. PS: Passwords cannot be changed here.

patch.summary: Sets Admin Field in a Restaurant

patch.description: Reset Admin Field in a Restaurant

post.description: Sign in for the restaurant and create a jwt token
Create an Ingredient. PS: Need to have admin_mode set

get.description: List all of the ingredients assigned to a specific restaurant

delete.description: Delete an Ingredient. PS: Need to have admin_mode set

post.description: Create a Recipe. PS: Need to have admin_mode set

400.description: Receita já cadastrada/Houve um problma, tente novamente

get.summary: List all restaurants's recipes w/o details
get.description: List the names of the recipes assigned to a specific restaurant

put.description: Update fields in a Recipe. PS: Need to have admin_mode set

get.summary: List a specific Recipe w/ details
get.description: List a specific Recipe through its id

delete.description: Delete a Recipe. PS: Need to have admin_mode set

post.description: Create a Portion Size. PS: Need to have admin_mode set

delete.description: Delete a Portion Size. PS: Need to have admin_mode set
